HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: WHAT'S NEW? - Core: Heart's desire has been added. It's rare, but it is guaranteed to cure the Cutie Pox when ingested. - Tree Hugger is now available to convert drugs into silver (or back again, should you wish). - Added twenty new recipes, all of which are available at Tree Hugger. WHAT'S CHANGED? - Core: Herbal cure kits no longer attempt to cure the Cutie Pox. - Core: Herbal cure kits now cure animal flu, and also have a chance to cure animal plague. - Core: Requests for luciferium and neutoramine are now handled by Tree Hugger instead of Nightmare Moon. - Magic mirrors now have 2000 hitpoints (was 500). Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: The Statue of the Three Villains has been moved from the Ideology DLC to the base game. Instead of acting as a terror structure, it now serves as an art piece, with a base beauty rating of 300. - XML Extensions: Added a new setting to configure whether or not the NPC faction is always present when starting a new colony. - XML Extensions/Biotech: Added a new setting to configure whether or not the Diamond Dog faction is always present when starting a new colony. - XML Extensions/Alpha Genes: Added a new setting to configure whether or not the batpony faction is always present when starting a new colony. WHAT'S CHANGED? - Core: The Statue of the Three Villains can now be built using metal. - The Statue of the Three Villains can now be built using wood. - Vanilla Backstories Expanded: Increased the Artistic skill gain of the 'MLP Obsessive' backstory to +20 (was +10). - Vanilla Backstories Expanded: Increased the Crafting skill gain of the 'MLP Obsessive' backstory to +20 (was +10). - Vanilla Backstories Expanded: Increased the Social skill gain of the 'MLP Obsessive' backstory to +20 (was +10). - Vanilla Backstories Expanded: Pawns with the 'MLP Obsessive' backstory may now spawn with drug desire traits. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: Letters sent by the research tracker now tell you what recipes have been unlocked. - Core: Added a new recipe to the Daybreaker statue which lets you convert 100 gold into 833 wood. - Royalty: Added two new recipes to the Nightmare Moon statue which let you request psychic readers and psychic harmonisers. - Biotech: Added a new recipe to the Daybreaker statue which allows you to safely dispose of toxic waste, 250 at a time. - Alpha Genes: Added a new recipe to the Fabric Exchange which allows you to purchase 100 ultima fabric for 500 silver. WHAT'S CHANGED? - Core: Renamed the 'plushie workbench' to the 'pony workbench.' - Biotech: The Princess Cadence plushie now increases fertility by 25% on top of her usual bonus. ;) - Dubs Bad Hygiene: The recipe to make chemfuel from fecal sludge is now unlocked after researching biofuel refining. - Higher Power: Increased the power output bonus given to Screwballs after researching advanced power to 50% (was 10%). Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: Starlight Glimmer plushies can now be equipped in their very own apparel slot. - Royalty: You can now request psychic harmonizers from Nightmare Moon (once you complete the newly added research project). - Allergies: Added Meadowbrook (-25% allergic sensitivity). - Dubs Bad Hygiene: You can now create 700 chemfuel using 1500 fecal sludge at the Daybreaker statue (once you research septic tanks). - Ponies of the Rim: Bronies now suffer mood penalties if they wear pony fur apparel or eat pony meat. - Ponies of the Rim: Anti bronies now gain mood bonuses if they wear pony fur apparel or eat pony meat. - Ponies of the Rim: More compatibility patches have been added. - Vanilla Achievements Expanded: Four new achievements have been added (one is for making the new plush added with the Allergies mod). WHAT'S CHANGED? - Core: Raiders will no longer target your Discord lamps. - Royalty: Requesting psychic neuroformers from Nightmare Moon now requires you to complete the aforementioned newly added research. - Vanilla Achievements Expanded: Some achievements have had their points value nerfed. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: Herbal cure kits are now made in batches of 2, and have a 10% chance of curing the plague. - Combat Extended: Harmony lasers now come in Sabot form. - Dubs Bad Hygiene: You can now request bionic bladders and hygiene enhancers from Nightmare Moon once you complete the hygiene bionics research. - Combat Extended: Rainbow Dash now reduces suppressability by 5%. WHAT'S CHANGED? - Biotech: Requesting deathrest capacity serums from Nightmare Moon no longer requires hemogen, but the silver cost has gone up to compensate. - Combat Extended: Armour piercing harmony lasers have had their sharp and blunt piercing damage increased. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? The mod is now available in French. - Core: Support for RimWorld 1.4 has been removed. - Core: You can now request reinforced barrels from Nightmare Moon once you research mortars. - Core: Enemies now have a chance to drop ruined plushies, which you can recycle at the plushie bench to get some materials. - Core: Nightmare Moon is no longer accepting item returns. - Core: Once you've researched brewing, Daybreaker will be able to help you make wort. - Biotech: The Diamond Dogs have learned archery. - Anomaly: All Thingpone recipes now require twisted meat as well as silver. - Ponies of the Rim: Ponies will no longer spawn with the xenotypes and/or genes added by My Little RimPony. Refer to the changelog for full details on all the changes! (There's a lot.)

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: You can now request 50 units of herbal medicine from Nightmare Moon in exchange for 250 units of (vegetarian) food. - Anomaly: Added Thingpone. This adorable eldritch horror will offer you items from beyond the void in exchange for silver (and, in one case, twisted meat). - Anomaly: You can now purchase dread leather from the Fabric Exchange. - Anomaly: Added two new recipes to the Daybreaker statue, allowing you to convert silver to bioferrite and vice versa. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: Added Miss Harshwhinny, a passive cooler that can freeze a room at twice the fuel cost. - Biotech: Added the Renegade Alicorn scenario. WHAT'S CHANGED? - Core: Poison joke plants now require 70% soil fertility (was 140%). - Core: Doubled the hitpoints of Screwballs. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Biotech: Added the batpony xenotype and faction (requires Alpha Genes). - Removed many of the conversion recipes from the Daybreaker statue. - Reduced combat power of NPC faction pawns to hopefully allow more to spawn during raids or other events. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Added a bunch of recipes to the Daybreaker statue which allow you to synthesise drugs in batches of 100, using half the regular amount of chemfuel. - Biotech: Added the Diamond Dog xenotype and faction. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - New Storyteller: Sunny Starscout (more friends and less enemies). - Biotech: The Brony Xenotypes scenario now includes a changeling. - All of the pony xenotypes now get along with each other. - Changelings can now come in a variety of colours. - Poison joke now has a chance of giving pawns the Cutie Pox. - Added Alpha genes patch for alicorns and pegasi which will give newly spawned ones a shiny pair of wings. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? The Changeling xenotype has been added. * Acid Spray * High cold resistance * Pyrophobia * High libido * Fertile * Very ugly * Grey eyes * Bald * No beard * Insect voice * Facial ridges * Ink black skin * Robust digestion * Pollution stimulus * Great construction skill * Great crafting skill * Terrible mining skill * Terrible cooking skill * Terrible plants skill * Terrible animals skill * Terrible artistic skill * Terrible medicine skill * Terrible social skill * Terrible intellectual skill

Welcome to the Xenotypes Update! What's New? - New Building: Marble Pie's Rock Exchange. - Plushies now have their own item slot. - Biotech: Four new pony based xenotypes. - Biotech: New xenotypes scenario.
